騞字的基本解释

騞
huō
象声词，形容多种响声：“其触物也，騞然而过。”
快速；忽然：“遂騞然脱扃。”

騞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huō］
［《集韻》霍虢切，入陌，曉。］
(1)刀裂物的声音。
(2)破裂声。
(3)快速；忽然。参见“騞然”。

騞字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騞； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1441第32
【集韻】【正韻】?霍虢切，音諕。【玉篇】行不止。　又解牛聲。【莊子·養生主】奏刀騞然。【音義】騞，呼獲反。徐許臂反，向他亦反，又音麥。崔云：音近獲，聲大于砉也。　又【五音集韻】莫白切，音陌。又土益切，音剔。義?同。

暂无。

Shan
Basic explanation of words
Shan
huō
Onomatopoeia, describing a variety of sounds: "It touches things, but it passes."
Quick; Suddenly: "Sui Qian got out of trouble."
Shan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huō]
["Ji Yun" Huo Guo cuts, enters Mo, Xiao. ]
(1) The sound of a knife cracking objects.
(2) Cracking sound.
(3) Fast; suddenly. See "Yuan Ran".
Shan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　騞; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1441 Page 32
[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Huo Guo cuts, the sound is incomplete. [Jade articles] More than a line.　Remove the sound of the cow again. [Zhuangzi·The Master of Health Preservation] Play the sword with great skill. [Sound and Meaning] Qian, call back. Xu Xu turned his arms against him, turned his back, and sounded Mai again. Cui Yun: The sound is recent, and the sound is louder than that.　[Five Yinji Yun] Mo Baiqie, Yinmo. The soil is cut again, and the sound is tick. Righteous? Same.
